pages.text: Nazzala `Alayka Al-Kitaba Bil-Haqqi Musaddiqaan Lima Bayna Yadayhi Wa 'Anzala At-Tawraata Wa Al-'Injila
Min Qablu Hudaan Lilnnasi Wa 'Anzala Al-Furqana 'Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Allahi Lahum `Adhabun Shadidun Wa Allahu `Azizun Dhu Antiqamin
Inna Allaha La Yakhfa `Alayhi Shay'un Fi Al-'ArÄ‘i Wa La Fi As-Sama'i
Huwa Al-Ladhi Yusawwirukum Fi Al-'Arhami Kayfa Yasha'u La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Al-`Azizu Al-Hakimu

Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Anzala `Alayka Al-Kitaba Minhu 'Ayatun Muhkamatun Hunna 'Ummu Al-Kitabi Wa 'Ukharu Mutashabihatun Fa'amma Al-Ladhina Fi Qulubihim Zayghun Fayattabi`una Ma Tashabaha Minhu Abtigha'a Al-Fitnati Wa Abtigha'a Ta'wilihi Wa Ma Ya`lamu Ta'wilahu 'Illa Allahu Wa Ar-Rasikhuna Fi Al-`Ilmi Yaquluna 'Amanna Bihi Kullun Min `Indi Rabbina Wa Ma Yadhakkaru 'Illa 'Ulu Al-'Albabi
Rabbana La Tuzigh Qulubana Ba`da 'Idh Hadaytana Wa Hab Lana Min Ladunka Rahmatan 'Innaka 'Anta Al-Wahhabu
Rabbana 'Innaka Jami`u An-Nasi Liyawmin La Rayba Fihi 'Inna Allaha La Yukhlifu Al-Mi`ada
